short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the number of unread messages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of your Outlook email with ease! The Hotmail Outlook Chrome extension provides a seamless way to monitor your unread emails without leaving your current browser tab. Designed for efficiency and convenience, this extension ensures you never miss an important email again.

Features:
Secure Login: Easily hotmail login to your Outlook account directly through the extension with a user-friendly interface.
Unread Email Count: Instantly see the number of unread outlook emails in your inbox at a glance.
Unread Email Details: View a detailed list of your unread emails, including sender and subject, to quickly prioritize your messages.
Background Notifications: Receive timely notifications about new unread hotmail emails while you browse.

How It Works:
Login: Securely outlook sigin your email account within the extension.
Monitor: Keep track of your unread hotmail emails with period 30 secunds, conveniently displayed in the extensions side panel.
Stay Informed: Get notifications for new unread emails without interrupting your browsing experience.

!!! NOTE:
This extenstion is not endorsed or administered by or associated with Microsoft Corporation.
Outlook is a registered trademark of the Microsoft Corporation.
Using this extension you can connect to mailboxes: outlook 365, h otmail, skype.
